amendment.description: To provide additional funding for innovative programs at the state and local level.

vote.text: Amendment SA 19 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 4.

action.text: Amendment SA 19 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S1036-1047; text: CR S1036) To provide additional funding for innovative programs at the state and local level.
